SELECT outerKey, innerKey, COUNT(DISTINCT sample_id) AS count FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT sample_id, #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey} AS outerKey, #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey} AS innerKey FROM mutation
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey}))) != 'null'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT sample_id, #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey} AS outerKey, #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey} AS innerKey FROM structural_variant
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey}))) != 'null'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT sample_id, #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey} AS outerKey, #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey} AS innerKey FROM sample_cna_event
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{namespaceAttribute.outerKey}, '.', #{namespaceAttribute.innerKey}))) != 'null'
) combinedCounts GROUP BY outerKey, innerKey;

SELECT value, outerKey, innerKey, COUNT(DISTINCT sample_id) AS count, COUNT(sample_id) AS totalCount FROM ( SELECT JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) AS value, #{outerKey} AS outerKey, #{innerKey} AS innerKey, sample_id AS sample_id FROM mutation
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) != 'null'
UNION ALL
SELECT JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) AS value, #{outerKey} AS outerKey, #{innerKey} AS innerKey, sample_id AS sample_id FROM structural_variant
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) != 'null'
UNION ALL
SELECT JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) AS value, #{outerKey} AS outerKey, #{innerKey} AS innerKey, sample_id AS sample_id FROM sample_cna_event
AND JSONExtractRaw(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey})) IS NOT NULL AND JSONExtractString(annotation_json, concat('$.', #{outerKey}, '.', #{innerKey}))) != 'null' ) combinedCounts GROUP BY value, outerKey, innerKey;
